Эта игра- главная причина играть во вторую часть
Wow. This gives me so much nostalgia, I used to listen to the entire 10 hour radio loop from the radio in this game. There’s a really cool Easter egg at the end of the video, trust me.

Наверное это одна из самых ГЕНИАЛЬНЫХ и в тоже время СКУЧНЫХ игр. Не стоит забывать что это Portal можно считать как демо-версия к второй части. Головоломки сначала сложные потом понимаешь какие они простые(кроме 18 камеры). 
Плюсы-
1)графика для 2007 была шикарной. но и сейчас ничего.
2)сама портальная пушка, когда ты впервые её пробуешь ты ощущаешь восторг.
3)дизайн игры.он тебе запоминается и это главное
Минусы-
1) ужасная русская локализация. Сравнивая с HL2 и Portal 2 это мусор.
2)её продолжительность. Это примерно 3-4 часа. За те же 200 рублей можно взять первого Ведьмака
ВСЁ!
Fisica quantica e teletransporte, jogo bom.
i have a feeling this game was a gift from god

I don't understand why your reading these reviews if you haven't already got the game, It has been out for a while and as cheesy as the trailer is, the game is a good buy and shouldn't need second thoughts buying it. Soundtrack paints the atmosphere and tone, good twists and lore.
Если вы не прошли эту игру, то вы быдло

[b]Вы[/b] , одни в заброшенном иследовательском комплексе , решаете головоломки , которые уже решали другие и может вы [u]последние кто сделает это[/u] , разгадывая загадки внутри [i]Aperture Scince...[/i]
[u]Нагнетающая атмосфера[/u] одиночества , неумолкаемый ИИ - [i]GLaDOS[/i] , [u]жажда свободы[/u] и конечно , сложные достижения . Это характеризует эту [b]великолепную[/b] игру , то-есть техно-демо , в которую [u]обязан[/u] поиграть каждый .

TL;DR: Even in 2022 this game i still a good experience, but Portal 2 is still way better

- Even in 2022 the story is still great
- Performance was a steady 60fps
- Controls are a bit finicky, especially when it tries to turn your camera
- Advanced Maps were also a good experience
- Challenge maps are still hard
- Had to set "SDL_VIDEODRIVER=x11 %command%" to workaround SDL trying to start in wayland over xwayland

Played on:
- Manjaro 21.2.3 (Kernel 5.16.5) with KDE Plasma + Wayland + Pipewire
- Linux Version
- GPU: AMD Vega 64
- CPU: Intel i7-7700K

GOOD: 8.2/10
⭐⭐⭐⭐

Story: 7.9
Gameplay/Controls/Kamera: 8.5
Graphics: 8.4
Sound/Music: 8
Character Customization/Level Design: 8.6
FUN: 7.7

Although its pretty old and a really short game, its still pretty fun and a bit challenging. Pretty entertaining for a puzzle solving game. Absolutely love the personality of GLaDOS. Could say her voice was the number 1 thing that made this game so much popular. Overall 100% recommended to try.

Super fun, still an amazing game after all these years.

Ótimo jogo. Os puzzles têm o nível certo de dificuldade, e mesmo assim te fazem sentir um gênio ao os resolver.  Tem a duração correta pra respeitar o seu tempo, se mantendo interessante do começo ao fim, além de ter algumas piadas genuinamente hilárias.

Muy god y con rejugabilidad épica.

Great puzzle game that is a classic. Good story that take a couple of hours to beat. If you like this then get portal 2 for more and improved content. Well worth the normal price but just wait until a big steam sale and it will be heavily discounted.
me encanta la nostagia me gana xd

Portal é um jogo fantástico que introduziu mecânicas nunca vistas antes em jogos e inspirou uma nova geração de jogos de puzzle a nascer. Se você nunca jogou, com certeza esse é uma experiência que você não pode deixar de ter. O jogo é curto - cerca de 3 horas se você completar só a história principal - e os puzzles são simples, mas a mecânica essencial de portais com o sistema de física da source tornam eles muito divertidos. [spoiler]Além disso, apesar da simplicidade, Portal tem um dos melhores antagonistas já criados em jogos até hoje em GLaDOS.[/spoiler]

Uma coisa que outras reviews não falaram muito são os [b]"mapas avançados"[/b] e os [b]"desafios"[/b]. Esses são mapas extras que não são necessários para completar a história principal do jogo, mas eles alteram o mapa e adicionam limites ao que o jogador pode fazer para completa-los eficientemente (como usar a menor quantidade de portais possíveis ou terminar o mapa dando apenas 10 passos). Esses desafios são MUITO mais complexos que o jogo base e adicionam um nível de complexidade que muitos jogadores ávidos de puzzlers complexos podem gostar.

[b]Portal: 9/10 - EXCELENTE[/b]
This is one of the best games ever done. Playing this and the second in 2022 and they still hold up to today standard.
Fun and short game. Very good introduction to the portal set.

maybe the real cake was the friends we made along the way
让一个游戏好玩的秘诀就是让这个游戏里最频繁的一个操作变得有趣，那么有什么是比随心所欲到处开传送门更让人上瘾的呢？玩法榨干了传送门这个概念，剧情悬疑，还让我第一次体验到了晕3d是什么感觉。
Una obra de arte, súper divertido
L'histoire et les puzzles sont pas mal pour un jeu créé en 2007. Combiné avec Portal 2, cela fait une série de 2 jeux incroyables.
